articles.title: Why prevention remains the best strategy against BF.7, other variants - The Indian Express
articles.description: Unfortunately, the virus has so far always been a step ahead of us. So we cannot be certain of what it will do next and when. We should always be prepared for the worst case scenario while hoping for the best.
